div.p: ONLIINE USER 1: So what about drugs and impairment?
ONLIINE USER 2: It's not the same--I would never drink and drive, but I'm actually a lot better driver when I'm high.
ONLIINE USER 3: Oh come on, there's no way you're a better driver when you're stoned.
ONLIINE USER 2: No, it's true, I can't drink and drive for nothing, but when I'm high, I'm able to focus on the road.
